alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 9:57AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...Yukon River at Russian Mission. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High water in Russian Mission is flooding the runway and it is unusable at this time. Water is surrounding some homes and other structures and overtopping roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 AM AKDT, residents reported an ice jam on Yukon River below Russian Mission. Water is backing up into Russian Mission and rapidly rising water levels are likely to continue until the ice jam releases. - a large surge of water and ice is currently moving down the Yukon River from ice jams that have released upriver near Ruby. Residents should be prepared for a long period of high water even after the ice jam releases. - http://weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Yukon River at Russian Mission stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
